intro: Randia psychotrioides, commonly known as the psychotrioides randia, is a tropical shrub native to Central and South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, fleshy fruits that are typically yellow or orange when mature. Randia psychotrioides is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and coastal areas.
